Literature.Title: Solid-Phase Synthesis and Antibacterial Activity of Cyclohexapeptide Wollamide B Analogs.
Literature.Author: Tsutsumi LS, Elmore JM, Dang UT, Wallace MJ, Marreddy R, Lee RB, Hurdle JG, Lee RE, Sun D

Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Relationships of Wollamide Cyclic Hexapeptides with Activity against Drug-Resistant and Intracellular Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
Literature.Author: Khalil ZG, Hill TA, De Leon Rodriguez LM, Lohman RJ, Hoang HN, Reiling N, Hillemann D, Brimble MA, Fairlie DP, Blumenthal A, Capon RJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=50µg/ml),Clostridioides difficile R20291(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 14990(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 33186(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=50µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 14579(MIC=50µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>200µg/ml),Escherichia coli deltatolC(MIC=200µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC90=2.97µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(IC50=1.03µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Ra(MIC90=0.33µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Ra(IC50=0.13µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis HN878(MIC90=0.99µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis HN878(IC50=0.66µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis HN353(MIC90=2.97µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis HN353(IC50=0.59µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CDC1551(MIC90=0.99µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CDC1551(IC50=0.71µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma SW620(IC50=>30µM),Human lung carcinoma NCI-H460(IC50=>30µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=>30µM)
